reviewText: I caught a couple of episodes of this on Comedy Central and when I found out it was on DVD, I snatched it up immediately. And what an experience this show is to watch!  I don't laugh out loud too often but this show had my laughing til I couldn't breathe.  I'd have to rewind several parts to hear what was said just because I couldn't hear them over my laughter.  This is in the vein of Jackass but seems "smarter" if that's a good way to put it.
